alert.note: Alert for Northern Oregon Cascades (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Portland (Northwest Oregon and Southwest Washington)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 25 at 3:45PM PST until December 26 at 4:00AM PST by NWS Portland
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 4 AM PST TUESDAY... * WHAT...Freezing rain. Additional ice accumulations of one tenth to two tenths of an inch through Monday night. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph. * WHERE...Northern Oregon Cascades. * WHEN...Until 4 AM PST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Difficult travel conditions are possible. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Precipitation should come to an end after 4 AM PST Tuesday.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. Prepare for possible power outages. For the latest road conditions call 5 1 1, or visit for Oregon: https://www.tripcheck.com and for Washington: https://wsdot.com/travel/real-time/map
